import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ResourceService } from '../../Services/resource/resource.service'; import { Resource } from '../../DTO/resource'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { resources: Resource[]; constructor(private resourceService: ResourceService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getResources(); } getResources(): void { this.resources = this.resourceService.getResources(); } }
